name: BT_REMOVE_BUFF
label: Buff Removal
description: Removes buffs from the target.

name: BT_AGGRO
label: Taunted
description: Uses a basic attack on the caster that inflicted Taunted. Removed when the caster dies.

name: BT_AGGRO_IR
label: Taunted
description: Uses a basic attack on the caster that inflicted Taunted. Removed when the caster dies. (Irremovable)

name: BT_SEAL_COUNTER
label: Uncounterable
description: Negates enemy reactive strikes: Counterattack, Revenge, or Agile Response.

name: BT_SEAL_ADDITIVE_ATTACK
label: Seal Extra Skill
description: The target cannot activate additional attack and extra skills.

name: BT_SEAL_ADDITIVE_ATTACK_IR
label: Seal Extra Skill
description: The target cannot activate additional attack and extra skills. (Irremovable)

name: BT_SEAL_ADDITIVE_TURN_IR
label: Seal Extra Turn
description: The target cannot be granted an extra turn. (Irremovable)

name: BT_STAT|ST_ACCURACY
label: Reduced Accuracy
description: Reduces Accuracy by 50%

name: BT_STAT|ST_ATK
label: Reduced Attack
description: Reduces Attack by 30%

name: BT_STAT|ST_ATK_IR
label: Reduced Attack
description: Reduces Attack by 30% (Irremovable)

name: BT_STAT|ST_SPEED
label: Reduced Speed
description: Reduces Speed by 30%

name: BT_STAT|ST_BUFF_RESIST
label: Reduced Resilience
description: Reduces Resilience by 100%

name: BT_STAT|ST_BUFF_CHANCE
label: Reduced Effectiveness
description: Reduces Effectiveness by 100%

name: BT_FREEZE
label: Frozen
description:
Restricts movement. Removed when the caster dies
Only the debuff with the longest duration among :
Frozen, Petrified, Stunned
can be inflicted at the same time

name: BT_FREEZE_IR
label: Frozen
description:
Restricts movement. Removed when the caster dies
Only the debuff with the longest duration among :
Frozen, Petrified, Stunned
can be inflicted at the same time. (Irremovable)

name: BT_STONE
label: Petrified
description:
Restricts movement. Removed when the caster dies
Only the debuff with the longest duration among :
Frozen, Petrified, Stunned
can be inflicted at the same time

name: BT_STONE_IR
label: Petrified
description:
Restricts movement. Removed when the caster dies
Only the debuff with the longest duration among :
Frozen, Petrified, Stunned
can be inflicted at the same time (Irremovable)

name: BT_ACTION_GAUGE
label: Reduces Priority
description: Reduces enemie(s) priority

name: BT_DOT_BURN
label: Burned
description:
Takes damage proportional to the caster's Attack at the start of the turn.
 Ignore Defense.
 Removed when the caster dies.

name: BT_DOT_BURN_IR
label: Burned
description:
Takes damage proportional to the caster's Attack at the start of the turn.
 Ignore Defense.
 Removed when the caster dies. (Cannot be removed)

name: BT_STAT|ST_AVOID
label: Reduced Evasion
description: Reduces Evasion by 50%

name: BT_STAT|ST_DEF
label: Reduced Defense
description: Reduces Defense by 50%

name: BT_STAT|ST_DEF_IR
label: Reduced Defense
description: Reduces Defense by 50% (Irremovable)

name: BT_STAT|ST_CRITICAL_RATE
label: Reduced Crit Hit Chance
description: Reduces Critical Hit Chance by 50%

name: BT_STAT|ST_CRITICAL_RATE_IR
label: Reduced Crit Hit Chance
description: Reduces Critical Hit Chance by 50% (Irremovable)

name: BT_STAT|ST_CRITICAL_DMG_RATE
label: Reduced Critical Damage
description: Reduces Critical Damage by 50%

name: BT_STUN
label: Stunned
description:
Restricts movement. Removed when the caster dies
Only the debuff with the longest duration among :
Frozen, Petrified, Stunned
can be inflicted at the same time

name: BT_STUN_IR
label: Stunned
description:
Restricts movement. Removed when the caster dies
Only the debuff with the longest duration among :
Frozen, Petrified, Stunned
can be inflicted at the same time (Irremovable)

name: BT_RANDOM
label: Random Debuff
description:
Inflict one of the following debuff : Reduced Attack
Reduced Critical Hit Chance
Reduced Speed
Reduced Defense

name: BT_WG_DMG
label: Weakness Gauge Damage
description: Deal additional Weakness Gauge damage

name: BT_SYS_DEBUFF_ENHANCE_IR
label: Enhancement
description: Reduces the efficiency of buff that increases stats by 100%. (Irremovable)

name: BT_SEALED
label: Unbuffable
description: Cannot gain buffs. (Excluding certain effects)

name: BT_SEALED_IR
label: Unbuffable
description: Cannot gain buffs. (Excluding certain effects, Cannot be removed)

name: BT_SILENCE
label: Silenced
description: Cannot only use skill chain and basic attack while this effect is applied

name: BT_SILENCE_IR
label: Silenced
description: Cannot only use skill chain and basic attack while this effect is applied (Irremovable)

name: BT_MARKING
label: Marked
description:
Automatically becomes a target for attacks and takes increased damage
Can only apply to one member of a team and another Marked cannot be applied until the existing Marked is gone

name: BT_STEAL_BUFF
label: Buff Stealing
description: Steal buff from the target.

name: BT_DOT_CURSE
label: Cursed
description:
Takes damage proportional to Health at the start of the turn (3% of max HP).
Removed when the caster dies

name: BT_DOT_CURSE_IR
label: Cursed
description:
Takes damage proportional to Health at the start of the turn (3% of max HP).
Removed when the caster dies (Irremovable)

name: BT_DOT_BLEED
label: Bleeding
description:
Reduces healing received. 
Takes damage proportional to the caster's Attack at the start of the turn.
Removed when the caster dies.

name: BT_DOT_BLEED_IR
label: Bleeding
description:
Reduces healing received. 
Takes damage proportional to the caster's Attack at the start of the turn.
Removed when the caster dies. (Irremovable)

name: BT_DOT_POISON
label: Poisoned
description:
Reduces all Priority increases by 20%. Takes damage proportional to the caster's Attack at the start of a turn.
Removed when the caster dies

name: BT_DOT_POISON_IR
label: Poisoned
description:
Reduces all Priority increases by 20%. Takes damage proportional to the caster's Attack at the start of a turn.
Removed when the caster dies. (Irremovable)

name: BT_DOT_LIGHTNING
label: Shocked
description:
Reduces Action Points generated by 50%. Takes damage to the caster's Attack at the start of the turn.
Removed when the caster dies.

name: BT_FIXED_DAMAGE
label: Fixed Damage
description: Deals a set amount of damage based on the target's max HP.

name: BT_STATBUFF_CONVERT_TO_STATDEBUFF
label: Buff Reversal
description:
Increased stat effect granted to the target become reduced stat effect.

Increased stat effects :
Attack, Defense, Speed, Critical Hit Chance, Critical Damage, Accuracy, Evasion, Effectiveness, Resilience

name: BT_COOL_CHARGE
label: Cooldown Increase
description: Increase target enemy skill cooldown

name: IG_Buff_BuffdurationReduce
label: Reduced Buff Duration
description: Reduced duration of beneficial effects granted on target

name: IG_Buff_DeBuffdurationIncrease
label: Increase Debuff Duration
description: Increased duration of detrimental effects granted on target

name: BT_SEALED_RESURRECTION
label: Extinction
description: Enemies killed by this skill cannot be Resurrected or Revived

name: BT_SEALED_RECEIVE_HEAL
label: Unhealable
description: Cannot be applied with Health recovery effects

name: BT_DETONATE
label: Detonate
description: Activates certain debuffs immediately. Magnitude determined by the number of turns remaining and stacks applied.

name: BT_DOT_ETERNAL_BLEED
label: Eternal Bleeding
description:
At the start of the turn, takes damage proportional to the caster's Effectiveness, and increases Priority of all enemies by 5%.
Removed when the caster dies

name: BT_AP_CHARGE
label: Discharge AP
description: Reduces enemy Action Points

name: BT_RESOURCE_DOWN
label: Unique Resource Down
description: Reduces the target's Unique Resource.

name: UNIQUE_MARTYRDOM
label: Martyrdom
description: Dies instantly if no enemy is killed before the duration ends

name: UNIQUE_IRREGULAR_INFECTION
label: Irregular Infection
description:
At the start of the turn, the caster's Enhancement Effect duration are reduced by 1 turn, and debuff durations of all enemies are reduced by 1 turn.
Applies to only one unit per team. If the effect is applied to a new target, the previous target's effect is removed.
Removed upon caster's death (Irremovable)

name: UNIQUE_KERAUNOS
label: Keraunos
description: Reduces healing received by 50%. (Irremovable)
